name: JumpInTheHole part one (BETA).
description:
This game is a puzzle and adventure game.

To progress, you will need to go through the holes. They might be below you, above you or even on the right. 

Yes, this game is gonna get harder but I believe that you can do it. :)

The more you progress the harder the game will be.

Warning this game is still in BETA.

Any feedback would be AWESOME!

This game was made by Jonathan Steadman.
